name: Chromium Pack
description:
This is a collection of other styles that I rolled up into one big CSS file (really just to save me time when I do a fresh install of Firefox).  All the styles are how I found them except for the first one; I tweaked it to use the bookmark icon instead of the home icon.  The last one I also tweaked it so it lines up better.
